text:
KRISHNA RAJAGOPAL: Really,
what opening learning means

hundreds of thousands,
millions, tens of millions.

The impact of OCW in opening
learning for millions

around the world is multiplied
by the role of educators

When they take
materials from OCW

and repurpose them and
use them and make them

part of their own teaching,
for each one educator that

does that, there's
dozens or hundreds

more people for whom the
opportunities to learn

are opened up by what
we've shared through OCW.
